name: The coin stacker (Carlos72890)
description:
--Developed for the zeno-jam 6--

Welcome to "The coin stacker", a retro jazz club where you can have fun stacking coins with any other.

Controlls:

Doom-like controlls, move using WASD / directional arrows, and turn left and right using the mouse.

Interact using "e".

Disable/enable cursor visibility using "enter" / "return".
